content.text: (FB 717) Resolved an Issue where the Vulnerability Sub-Table did not populate. The Vulnerability Sub-Table now populates and displays properly
(FB 713) Addressed issue where the scroll bars were not scaled properly. The scroll bars are now properly scaled for large asset lists in an updated grid view
(FB 702) Resolved issue where the Vulnerability Sub-Table wasn't visible for small asset lists. The Sub-Table is now visible with a small list.
